1071401.name: Bloody Storm of Blades
1071401.desc:
Combat Start: gain 1 Offense Level Up and 1 Defense Level Up for every 20% missing HP on self (max 3)

Gain [ChickenFightlust] when meeting one of the following conditions: (10 per turn)
- Gain 3 at Clash Start
- Gain 1 when this unit hits with a Base Attack Skill or when this unit takes [Combustion] damage
At less than 50% HP, gain 1 more [ChickenFightlust]
- Gain 5 On Kill

1071402.name: Gamefowl
1071402.desc:
When activating [HeishouCombo], The Lord of Hongyuan Hong Lu gains the following effect as the [HeishouComboCountHonglu] effect:
- On Hit with this unit's Base Attack Skill: Deal 5% of Gluttony damage dealt as Wrath damage

Cannot be Staggered or fall below 1 HP due to [Combustion] damage.

Gain 3 [ChickenStance] and +3 [Combustion] Count in the same turn it Substitutes or Returns in.

1071403.name: Flame Rooster's Death Defiance [炎鳥不死戰]
1071403.desc:
In this Encounter, when this unit takes damage that brings their HP down to 0, nullify that damage; then, this unit's HP cannot drop below 1 for the turn.
Then, at the next Turn Start, heal (20 + [Combustion] on self)% HP, and remove all [Combustion] on self (max 49%; once per Encounter)

1071421.name: Backed Against a River
1071421.desc: Turn End: if an ally with the lowest current HP percentage has less than 50% HP, that unit gains 1 [ParryingResultUp] next turn

notes.short: Standard Heishou (S3 or defense gives a 3 turn buff, works with {identity:10613} mechanics) + Adept (builds a resource that's consumed to use a stronger S3) mechanics. Use S3 at 20 {status:ChickenFightlust}. Applies {status:Combustion} on self to generate more {status:ChickenFightlust}, then consumes it to heal with his S3-2. Cannot be staggered or die due to {status:Combustion}. Ignores death once and consumes all {status:Combustion} to heal himself.
notes.full:
Use S3 or defense to gain {status:ChickenStance} for 3 turns, giving him increased {status:Combustion} and {status:Burst} application, SP healing on staggering or killing his target, and {status:AttackUp} and {status:Agility} at max SP. Having the buff, or alternatively being below 50% HP, also gives him a Coin Reuse on his S2 on heads hit of the last coin and turns all the coins on his base S3 into {status:SuperCoin}.

He can gain up to 10 {status:ChickenFightlust} per turn. He gains 3 per clash start, 1 per hit on his target with a base attack skill, 1 whenever he takes {status:Combustion} damage (2 at less than 50% HP), and 5 per kill. {status:ChickenFightlust} gives him additional damage per stack and 1 {status:Agility} per 10 stacks. At 20 stacks, his S3 consumes all 20 stacks to trigger S3-2 instead.

Both versions of his S3 have 3 atk weight and {status:WideAreaRampage}, which means he attacks 1 random target for each coin instead of hitting all of them. The base version repeatedly applies and triggers {status:Combustion} on himself at 50+% HP to help him generate {status:ChickenFightlust} and bring him closer to 50% HP, then deals up to 20% of the final coin's damage as {keyword:Gluttony} damage to all targets. His S3-2 deals bonus damage based on his (and his target's) missing HP, then deals 20% of the final coin's damage as {keyword:Wrath} damage to all targets. At 20+ {status:Combustion}, his final coin gets reused then he consumes any {status:Combustion} he had over 20 to heal himself. The coin reuse can also be triggered by being under 50% HP.

He gets some bonus {status:AttackUp} and {status:DefenseUp} based on missing HP. He also can't die from {status:Combustion} damage, and ignores death once and will consume all {status:Combustion} on himself to heal when that triggers.

His buff for {identity:10613} is a 5% bonus {keyword:Wrath} damage when he deals {keyword:Gluttony} damage. His sources of {keyword:Gluttony} damage include his S2 and E.G.Os like {ego:20608}.
